I

InboxDAO - Class in controller
This class contains two methods, one to insert a new Message into the database and one to select all Messages from the database.
InboxDAO() - Constructor for class controller.InboxDAO
 
InboxDB - Class in controller
This class contains one method.
InboxDB() - Constructor for class controller.InboxDB
 
InboxFrame - Class in view
This class is the main frame of the application, it is used to input Message for a user and save that to the database.
InboxFrame() - Constructor for class view.InboxFrame
Creates new form InboxFrame
InboxFrame.event - Class in view
This event is invoked when the user types in a message in the txtMessage

K

keyPressed(KeyEvent) - Method in class view.InboxFrame.event
 
keyReleased(KeyEvent) - Method in class view.InboxFrame.event
This event is invoked when the user has finished typing in the txtMessage
keyTyped(KeyEvent) - Method in class view.InboxFrame.event
 

L

list() - Method in class controller.InboxDAO
This method will query the Messages database and get all Messages It will then convert each row from the table into a Message object (or its subtype) and add each one to a list.
LoadMsg() - Method in class view.InboxFrame
This method is called to populate the table

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class view.InboxFrame
 
Message - Class in model
This class is the parent class for all Messages and it contains member variables common to all child classes, such as id, sender name, recipient name, message and message status
Message(int, String, String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class model.Message
 
Message(String, String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class model.Message
 
MMS - Class in model
This class is a sub class of Message The MMS class will contain the extra information of the file path and message type
MMS(int, String, String, String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class model.MMS
 
MMS(String, String, String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class model.MMS
